statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Terraza coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${10.00} per pound with some Gualtemala Antigua coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${13.40} per pound to create \displaystyle{40} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${11.53} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
